thread.title: Nigeria: Dangote, China's Sinoma to Sign U.S.$4.34 Billion Africa Cement Plant Deals
thread.title_full: Nigeria: Dangote, China's Sinoma to Sign U.S.$4.34 Billion Africa Cement Plant Deals

title: Nigeria: Dangote, China's Sinoma to Sign U.S.$4.34 Billion Africa Cement Plant Deals
text:
Cote d'Ivoire: Jumia Launches the "Home Week" in Côte d'Ivoire By Reuters 
Nigeria's Dangote Cement will sign $4.34 billion worth of contracts with China's Sinoma International Engineering Co. on Wednesday to build cement plants across Africa, Nigeria's largest listed firm said. 
The plants to be built in Cameroon, Ethiopia, Kenya, Mali, Nepal, Niger, Senegal and Zambia, will add 25 million tonnes to Dangote's existing capacity of almost 50 million tonnes, Group Executive Director Edwin Devakumar said. Nigeria
